email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Oceanic Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Would you be able to come down to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer $51.25 per metric ton, which is a fair middle ground. Laytime is 72 hours, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Sarah, $51.25 sounds reasonable. However, could we push the laycan to 18-23 October to better align with our schedule? Also, can we cap the demurrage at $20,000 per day? Let me know your thoughts. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can adjust the laycan to 18-23 October as requested. However, the demurrage rate is firm at $25,000 per day due to the vessel’s tight schedule. Let me know if we can proceed on these terms. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Sarah, understood on the demurrage. Let’s proceed with the laycan of 18-23 October and the freight rate of $51.25 per metric ton. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Recap: Crude Oil Shipment from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hi John, as discussed, here’s the recap: Vessel: MV Oceanic Star, DWT 150,000, LOA 280m. Cargo: Crude Oil, 120,000 MT. Load Port: Houston. Discharge Port: Rotterdam. Laycan: 18-23 October. Freight Rate: $51.25 per metric ton. Demurrage: $25,000 per day pro rata. Please confirm if everything looks good. Best, Sarah
